oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Claim of N. A. D. Bryant against the State of Tennessee for supplies furnished to Confederate forces
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reparation claim of N. A. D. Bryant for "quartermaster stores." These state (as opposed to US) claims for Civil War damages are fairly rare and were instituted by Gov. Brownlow's Reconstruction government to compensate loyalists for wartime losses incurred at the hands of Confederate forces. Original in the Hardeman County Archives. The materials have been microfilmed and are available for research at the Tennessee State Library and Archives (Hardeman County Loose Records Project, Roll A-19,438).
